claimGovernance().details: Claim Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the new Governor.

governor().details: Returns the address of the current Governor.

params.controllerAddress: - Address for the account that will receive the      rewards

isGovernor().details: Returns true if the caller is the current Governor.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.toAddress: - address of the recipient of the tokens
params.tokenAddress: - address of the token to recover
params.tokenAmount: - amount of the token to recover

sendETHRewards(address,uint256).details: Send ETH rewards to a user. Can only be called by controller.

params.userAddress: - address of the recipient of the ETH

sendTokenRewards(address,address,uint256.details: Send token rewards to a user. Can only be called by controller.

params.amount: - amount of the token to send
params.tokenAddress: - address of the token to send
params.userAddress: - address of the recipient of the tokens

transferGovernance(address).details: Transfers Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the current Governor. Must be claimed for this to complete

recoverERC20(address,uint256,address).notice: Recover ERC20 tokens sent to contract.  This can only be called      by the governor.

userdoc.notice: Contract to collect NFT sales profits and rewards to be distributed      to OGN stakers.
